{% set payroll_period = frappe.db.get_all("Payroll Period", filters=[ ["start_date", "<=", doc.start_date], ["end_date", ">=", doc.start_date] ], fields=["name","start_date", "end_date"], limit=1)[0] %} {% set start = frappe.utils.get_datetime(payroll_period.start_date) %} {% set end = frappe.utils.get_datetime(payroll_period.end_date) %} {% set months_count = frappe.utils.month_diff(end, start) + 1 %} {# Build month list #} {% set month_list = [] %} {% for i in range(months_count) %} {% set m = frappe.utils.add_months(start, i) %} {% set _ = month_list.append(frappe.utils.formatdate(m, "MMM yyyy")) %} {% endfor %}

CUMULATIVE MONTHLY SALARY (FY:{{payroll_period.get("name")}})

{% for m in month_list %} {% endfor %} {% set component_map = {} %} {# Fetch salary slips for the employee in this payroll period #} {% for slip in frappe.get_all("Salary Slip", filters={ "employee": doc.employee, "start_date": [">=", payroll_period.start_date], "end_date": ["<=", payroll_period.end_date] }, order_by="start_date asc", fields=["name", "start_date"]) %} {% set slip_doc = frappe.get_doc("Salary Slip", slip.name) %} {% set month_name = frappe.utils.formatdate(slip_doc.start_date, "MMM yyyy") %} {% for earning in slip_doc.earnings %} {% if earning.salary_component not in component_map %} {% set _ = component_map.update({earning.salary_component: {}}) %} {% endif %} {% set _ = component_map[earning.salary_component].update({month_name: earning.amount}) %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %} {# Print rows for each unique component #} {% for component, month_data in component_map.items() %} {% set row_total = namespace(val=0) %} {% for m in month_list %} {% set amt = month_data.get(m, 0) %} {% set row_total.val = row_total.val + amt %} {% endfor %} {% for m in month_list %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %} {# Grand Total Row #} {% set grand_total = namespace(val=0) %} {% for component, month_data in component_map.items() %} {% for m in month_list %} {% set grand_total.val = grand_total.val + month_data.get(m, 0) %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %} {% for m in month_list %} {% set col_total = namespace(val=0) %} {% for component, month_data in component_map.items() %} {% set col_total.val = col_total.val + month_data.get(m, 0) %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
Particulars Total{{ m }}
{{ component }}{{ "%.2f"|format(row_total.val) }} {{ "%.2f"|format(month_data.get(m, 0)) }}
Total{{ "%.2f"|format(grand_total.val) }}{{ "%.2f"|format(col_total.val) }}
